hadiths.text: Narrated Qatada:I asked Anas (about the Prophet's `Umra) and he replied, "The Prophet (ﷺ) performed `Umra when the pagans made him return, and Umra of al-Hudaibiya (the next year), and another `Umra in Dhi-l-Qa'da, and another `Umra in combination with his Hajj

chapter.ara-name: باب كَمِ اعْتَمَرَ النَّبِيُّ صلى الله عليه وسلم
chapter.eng-name: How many times did the Prophet (ﷺ) perform 'Umra ?
